options.spellendid.title: Spellendid
option.spellendid.enable_rich_presence.t: Whether or not a rich presence should be displayed on your Discord client
option.spellendid.rich_presence_display_: Display the time you've been on Smash Wizards for in your Discord rich presence
Display the server you're currently connected to in your Discord rich presence
option.spellendid.remove_loading_terrain: Remove the built-in 2 seconds loading screen delay when loading new terrain

Remove the loading terrain delay everywhere (on every server & world).
The 'Remove Loading Terrain Delay' option must be true for this to work
option.spellendid.play_fall_damage_sound: Whether or not fall damage sounds should be played when falling on the ground
